body.p: Nova offers scalable, on-demand, self-service access to compute resources. You can use this guide to help with known issues and troubleshooting of Nova services.

ul.li:
Nova-consoleauth
If Nova-consoleauth fails on the first controller node, you can switch it to another controller node by running the ansible playbook nova-start.yml and passing it the index of the next controller node.
The command to switch nova-consoleauth to another controller node (controller 2 for instance) is: ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts nova-start.yml --extra-vars "consoleauth_host_index=1"
